# Plain HTML

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
lz <- tags$iframe(src ="lz.htm", width = "100%", height = "500px")
```

# Shiny

```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  tags$iframe(src = "lz.htm", width = "100%", height = "500px")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  # Server logic goes here
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
